reviews.review_msg: focus on the past exams will be leading you to succeed.......the exam questions at least 90% similiar to the past exam and assignment...

even though i bombed in the final and got a really low mark which i'd never thought of, frankly she is helpful and approachable in her office hour and at least trying to be nice to the students. Just had no idea why she is so picky on the marks and failed so many ppl.
